name: BroadData Conferencing
tag_list: audio-conferencing, international-audio-conferencing, operator-assisted-audio-conferencing, teleconference, teleconferencing, conference-call
overview: BroadData offers robust, feature-rich domestic reservationless Audio conferencing, international reservationless audio conferencing, operator assisted audio conferencing and web conferencing services, enabling businesses and organizations access to simple, powerful ways to conduct meetings, seminars and events. As a result, BroadData customers, who represent a cross section of businesses of all sizes, improve productivity, reduce costs and increase revenues.
